required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on October 07, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Uppföljning av Patienter Som intensivvårdats för COVID-19

brief_summary.textblock: The study will follow COVID-19 patients who required intensive care after 3-6 months and one year after discharge from the ICU with functional level as well as organ function to assess recovery after COVID-19. Blood and urine will be collected for biobanking.

detailed_description.textblock: The study will follow COVID-19 patients who required intensive care at Uppsala University Hospital and were included in the Uppsala COVID-19 biobank. The patients will be contacted after three to six months for a first follow-up with assessment of functional level in activities of daily life, psychiatric symptoms, neurological symptoms and working capacity as well as specific organ functions. The organ functions will include circulation, respiration, coagulation, immune function and kidney function. In addition, blood and urine will be collected for biobanking.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Within 90 days after admission to ICU.
Within 1 year after admission to ICU.
At follow-up three to six months after ICU discharge.
primary_outcome.description: Return of renal function measured as CKD stage.

primary_outcome.time_frame: At follow-up one year after ICU discharge.
primary_outcome.description: Return of renal function measured as CKD stage.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Three to six months from discharge from ICU
primary_outcome.description: Respiratory function as assessed by a clinician

primary_outcome.time_frame: Three to six months from discharge from ICU
Three to six months from discharge from ICU
primary_outcome.description: Quality of Life assessed using the 36-item short form survey by RAND.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Three to six months from discharge from ICU
primary_outcome.description: Cognitive screening using the Montreal Cognitive Assessment.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Three to six months from discharge from ICU
primary_outcome.description: Screening for frailty using the Clinical Frailty Scale-9.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Three to six months from discharge from ICU
primary_outcome.description: Screening of functional level for Activities of Daily Life using the 5-level EQ-5D.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Three to six months from discharge from ICU
primary_outcome.description: Screening for anxiety using the Generalised Anxiety Disorder 7-item scale.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Three to six months from discharge from ICU
primary_outcome.description: Screening for depression using the Patient Health Questionnaire 9.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Three to six months from discharge from ICU
primary_outcome.description: Neurological function as assessed by a clinician

arm_group.description: Patients with PCR-confirmed COVID-19 who were treated in the intensive care unit.

biospec_descr.textblock: Urine, Whole blood, Dried blood, Serum, EDTA-plasma, Citrate-plasma, cheek swab.

study_pop.textblock: Adult patients admitted to ICU for COVID-19.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- PCR-verified Covid-19
- Treated in ICU
Exclusion Criteria:
- Pregnant of breastfeeding

patient_data.ipd_description: Data will be shared on reasonable request.
